meanings.sent1: The stringinesses of the cheese made it difficult to cut smoothly.
meanings.sent2: I don't like the stringinesses of okra when it's cooked.
meanings.sent3: The stringinesses of the spaghetti were so strong, they could be used as a slingshot!
meanings.sent4: The stringinesses of the situation were so tangled, it felt like trying to unravel a knot.
meanings.sent5: The stringinesses of the caramel made it stretch like a rubber band.

meanings.definition: The state of having string-like characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The fabric's stringinesses made it perfect for crafting.
meanings.sent2: The stringinesses of the plant's roots helped it cling to the wall.
meanings.sent3: The stringinesses of the yarn reminded me of a spider's web.
meanings.sent4: The stringinesses of the vines intertwined like a dance in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The stringinesses of the hair tie kept it securely in place.
